detail:
Davey has been developing games since 2009, when he began working on The Stanley Parable in his free time. He then collaborated with a team of other developers on The Stanley Parable remake, which came out in 2013. He has given a number of talks and conferences and universities, including this one which he delivered to Aalto University in Helsinki in 2015. He lives in Austin, Texas and has two cats named Tito and Spider. Spider is really snuggly; Tito and Davey’s personalities don’t line up quite so easily, but they’ve learned to enjoy one another’s company and today they get along pretty well.

If you’d like to get in touch, you can email Davey at daveywreden@gmail.com. You can also find him on twitter at @HelloCakebread. If you have a tech support question, please email gran.pc@gmail.com.
